summary: August 30 is the 242nd day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Princess Lilian, Duchess of Halland , was a Welsh fashion model who became a member of the Swedish royal family through her 1976 marriage to Prince Bertil, Duke of Halland . As such, she was a paternal aunt of King Carl XVI Gustaf of Sweden  and a maternal aunt of Queen Margrethe II of Denmark and Queen Anne-Marie of Greece.
title: Princess Lilian, Duchess of Halland
